mapper.select: SELECT l.img, l.id, l.name, l.is_attend AS isAttend, l.email, l.contact, l.rdate AS attdDate, l.is_join AS isJoin FROM ( SELECT s.img, s.id, s.name, a.is_attend, s.email, s.contact, a.rdate, s.is_join, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY s.id ORDER BY (TO_DATE(a.rdate, 'YYYY.MM.DD')) DESC) AS rn FROM stdn s LEFT OUTER JOIN attd a ON s.id = a.stdn_id ) l WHERE l.is_join = 1 AND l.rn = 1
